Reverse_engineering_guide.md.description: Methodology of reverse engineering the outrank.so webapp to create Rank.brnd

OUTRANK_ANALYSIS_INDEX.md.description: Master index and navigation guide for all Outrank.so reverse engineering documentation, including 6 comprehensive documents covering API analysis, database schema, architecture diagrams, and implementation guides. Use this file to find specific information across the entire documentation set.

OUTRANK_ANALYSIS_SUMMARY.md.description: Executive summary of the complete Outrank.so analysis, capturing 35+ network requests, documenting 25+ API endpoints, inferring 13 database tables, and identifying 7 third-party integrations. Best for quick overview and understanding the complete system architecture.

OUTRANK_API_ANALYSIS.md.description: Complete API and backend analysis with 14,000+ words covering all API endpoints, authentication flows, database schema inference, request/response patterns, third-party integrations, security observations, and performance metrics. Essential for understanding how Outrank.so's backend works.

OUTRANK_API_GUIDE.md.description: Developer guide with 10,000+ words providing complete API interaction instructions, PostgREST query syntax reference, code examples in JavaScript/Python/cURL, error handling patterns, rate limiting strategies, and best practices. Use this when building integrations or implementing similar features.

OUTRANK_DATABASE_SCHEMA.md.description: Complete PostgreSQL database documentation with 8,000+ words covering 13 tables, relationships, ERD diagrams, Row Level Security (RLS) policies, indexing strategy, migration examples, and backup procedures. Essential for database modeling and understanding data relationships.

OUTRANK_ENDPOINTS_REFERENCE.md.description: Quick reference guide with 4,000+ words for all API endpoints, frontend routes, query patterns, HTTP methods, status codes, SDK examples, and cURL templates. Use this for quick lookup during development instead of reading the full API guide.

OUTRANK_ARCHITECTURE_DIAGRAMS.md.description: Visual architecture documentation with 11 detailed diagrams covering system architecture, authentication flow, data access, database relationships, request/response flow, real-time data, security layers, multi-tenancy, API lifecycle, error handling, and caching strategy. Best for understanding system design and data flow.

OUTRANK_DISCOVERY_SUMMARY.md.description: Feature discovery executive summarizing 50+ discovered features, 30+ user stories, and 10+ explored pages from Outrank.so. Covers top 10 core features, competitive advantages, pricing model, and user journey maps. Essential for understanding what features Outrank.so offers.

OUTRANK_FEATURE_DISCOVERY_REPORT.md.description: Complete feature inventory with 1,386 lines documenting all discovered features in detail, including user stories, acceptance criteria, feature priorities, navigation structure, and hidden/advanced features. Use this to understand every feature Outrank.so provides.

OUTRANK_UI_ANALYSIS.md.description: User interface analysis covering the complete UI structure, component breakdown, UX patterns, responsive design, navigation flows, and visual design system. Essential for understanding how Outrank.so's frontend is structured and how to replicate the UI.

OUTRANK_DEVFLOW_COMPARISON.md.description: Detailed comparison between Outrank.so and DevFlow platforms, analyzing feature overlap, architectural differences, technology stack choices, and learnings that can be applied to Rank.brnd. Use this to understand how DevFlow compares to Outrank.so.
